Uses of Package
com.fdmgroup.Week3Assessment

  • Classes in com.fdmgroup.Week3Assessment used by com.fdmgroup.Week3Assessment
    Class
    Description
    Currency
    Class contains each currency's details such as Code, AlphaCode, Numerical Code, currency name, exchange rate from USD, date and exchange rate to USD Getters and setters for all the attributes included.
    InsufficientFundsException
    Custom exception class for TransactionProcessor Throws an exception when the amount user trying to convert is larger than the amount in the wallet
    InvalidCurrencyException
    Custom exception class for TransactionProcessor Throws an exception when the currency user trying to convert is not present in the wallet
    User
    Class contains user details such as name and wallet.
    UserNotFoundException
    Custom exception class for TransactionProcessor Throws an exception when the user name does not exist in the array of User objects.
